body: Finally tried making #sushi at home! What do you all think? #homemade #foodie

comments.body: That looks amazing! How did it turn out?
@10101 Not bad for a first try! The rice was a bit tricky, but overall I’m pretty happy with it.
Did you use fresh fish or go with veggies? It looks like something from a restaurant!
@11111 Thanks! I used a mix of both—some tuna, salmon, and a veggie roll with avocado and cucumber.
Sushi at home? Bold move! Did you have to buy any special equipment for it?
@12121 Yeah, I got a sushi rolling mat and a really sharp knife—both were essential!
That’s so impressive! Did you make the rice yourself? I’ve heard that’s the hardest part to get right.
@23232 Yup, made the rice from scratch! It took a couple of tries, but I think I got it down by the end.
Looks so good! What’s your favorite roll? I need to know what I should try next!
@34343 Definitely the spicy tuna roll! It’s super flavorful and was surprisingly easy to make.
